SKILLS:

Business Analyst/Manager with in-depth experience in the energy sector, knowledge of the CIS market, and newly equipped skills in programming and data analysis from Northwestern University's Data Science and Visualization Boot Camp. Problem-solving, data intuition, and strategic thinking expertise are backed by more than 20 years of business experience and a solid educational background from the Executive MBA program of the University of Chicago, the Booth School of Business. Resilience along with vision and ability to recognize opportunity is grounded by more than 7 years of entrepreneurial experience in building a business from scratch.
